programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Josh Mankiewicz reports on the mysterious disappearance of a Colorado rancher, whose friends think something isn't right and spend years fighting for answers.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When Nichole Payne and her son Taylor are found dead in their home, it takes nearly a decade to unravel what happened; for the first time on television, Nichole's children share what they saw the day their mother and brother were murdered.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A woman finds her way back to her family after being kidnapped 30 years earlier.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A man charged with murder claims he was too fat to have committed the crime.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A man from Iowa is shot to death while sleeping in bed next to his fiancee; coincidences and quick thinking lead to surprising information regarding the killer's motive.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A Connecticut bank executive is targeted by criminals who force him to rob his own bank.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Convicted murderer Drew Peterson speaks out about the murder of his third wife and the disappearance of his fourth wife in his first network TV interview in more than a decade; insiders close to the case speak out, including Stacy Peterson's sister.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When a husband and father disappears, detectives uncover a love triangle and a twisted plot through social media and text messages.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: An Idaho woman's affair with her married boss leads to a lethal confrontation.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: During a weekend away, a longtime married couple go on an afternoon hike that ends in tragedy; a multitude of evidence makes the mystery hard to untangle.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When a mother of four dies unexpectedly on Valentine's Day, her death is attributed to natural causes, but a detective suspects that someone murdered the woman.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The survivor of a horrible attack is convinced police have the wrong suspect.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When one woman breaks off her relationship with a boyfriend she says abused and stalked her, he moves on to something even worse.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A look at the case of con man John Meehan, including interviews with his wife and her daughter, his ex-wife, law enforcement officers, and the Los Angeles Times reporter who shined a spotlight on the story.
